Text:
This was such an awesome movie. It reminds me of that film "Festival Express" at points, though, more in tune singing, and some down right amazing fiddle playing. (way better than drunk Rick Danko...lol)

There are two absolutely sublime portions : the Austin high school marching band with Mumford, and the end jam all band rendition of "This Train is Bound for Glory" (none gonna ride but the righteous and the holy)

It's over too soon, and you want it to keep going.

Thanks!!!!!

if someone release the bonus track would be so f****** great!

A Million Years (Alex - Solo Version) - Edward Sharpe & The Magnetic Zeros - Bonus Track
Hard To Tell (Live) - Old Crow Medicine Show - Bonus Track
Awake My Soul (Live) - Mumford & Sons - Bonus Track
Fiya Wata (Live) - Edward Sharpe & The Magnetic Zeros - Bonus Track
Janglin' (The Little Girl - Live) - Edward Sharpe & The Magnetic Zeros - Bonus Track
Take 'em Away - Marcus, Ketch & Various - Bonus Track
Child - Edward Sharpe & The Magnetic Zeros - Bonus Track
